title: 210 - You've Been Lied To And It's Holding You Back
description:
In the movie Mean Girls, Regina George believes that these carb bars will make her lose weight, when in fact they are intended to make you GAIN WEIGHT!
.
Why does she believe this? Because Lindsay Lohan lies to her.
.
My point? Don’t eat carb bars… AND believing a lie can have TERRIBLE CONSEQUENCES EVEN ABOVE AND BEYOND NOT BEING PROM READY!
.
In the latest episode I show my SALTY SIDE. THIS IS A SALTY PIZZA EPISODE. I’m mad because I believe we creative types are force fed lies that hurt our ability to thrive to our full potential.
.
In this episode of Creative Pep Talk podcast, I’ll tell you why I’m mad, what lies are hurting you and I’ll share tactics to transcend these lies to live your full creative potential.

CREDITS

Thanks to Yoni Wolf and the band WHY? for our theme music.

Thanks to Alex Sugg for editing and the podcast!
www.alexsugg.com

SPONSORS
